description:
Position Overview

At PNC, our people are our greatest differentiator and competitive advantage in the markets we serve. We are all united in delivering the best experience for our customers. We work together each day to foster an inclusive workplace culture where all of our employees feel respected, valued and have an opportunity to contribute to the company’s success. As a Data Scientist Senior within PNC's Capital Markets Technology organization, you will be based in Pittsburgh, PA or Cleveland, OH.

Responsibilities of the role include:
